author: S. Vijay Kumar
title: COVID19: Tamil Nadu notifies separate jails for newcomers
description: Director-General of Police (Prisons) Sunil Kumar Singh said that the move was to prevent the spread of COVID-19 from any newcomer to the existing prisoners
content: In a bid to ensure that prisoners already lodged in prisons across the State do not contract COVID-19 from fresh inmates, the Tamil Nadu Prison Department has notified District Jails, Sub-Jails and Borstal schools at 37 cities/districts to accommodate newcome… [+1240 chars]
